name: 李春穎
objective:
讀書報告、專題討論、機電科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Mechatronics in Modern Industries.
schedule:
1. Introduction & Course Requirements (1 weeks)
2. Lectures & Seminars by Invited Speakers (10 weeks)
3. Research Presentations by Selected Senior Ph.D. Students
scorePolicy:
1. Attendance and Participation in Discussion (50%)
2. Seminar Summary Reports (50%)

covid19.courseScoreMethod: Same grading policy as regular class, except each summary report has to be emailed to teaching assistant before each deadline. No written exam will be given in this class.
covid19.courseInfo: Please join the Google Meet (meet.google.com/hgf-jyux-zxc) if the physical attendance to the class is prohibited.
